reviews.review: Mich persöhlich hat dieses Spiel vor allem durch ihre Story gefesselt. Meiner Meinung nach ist aber als für mich einzigster Kritikpunkt zu viel Shooter dabei. Durch viele  "Fähigkeiten", von denen man viele optional findet wird das aber auch noch abwechlungsreicher.
This is much better then some of the FPS games released 2014! :)
Auch wenn die Kampagne etwas kurz ist, ist Bioshock Infinite einfach ein super Steampunkshooter

Bought this game with the season bundle,really great game,everything is good,though there is no Multi,but it have great story,i really like it...It is worth it,The characters,from booker and liz to comstock and the twins.

Though it is hard to keep up with the story line in the end (a lot of information without a lot of time to relate it to all the things that happened earlier) I absolutely love this game. And a second playthrough cleared up a lot and its definitely a very good game. The story line is very good in my opinion but I guess I better not say why...

Graphics - Very good
Gameplay - Epic
Story line - Mind blown several times
Fun - Epic

One playthrough was quite short though... But I was mainly following the main quest line so check other revieuws on that.

Definitely buy this if you are into any kind of shooter games, or fantasy, or like good story lines, or if you want to call yourself a gamer.

Несомненно, это лучшее, во что я играл за последние года 2. За меня тут уже все сказали, поэтому я добавлю немного "отсебятины".
Я играл в первый биошок, который мне, увы, не понравился. Но эту часть я проходил на одном дыхании. Пройдя первый раз я мало что понял в сюжете, ибо совсем не читал субтитры(очень зря, скажу вам). ЧИТАЙТЕ ВСЕ ПОЛНОСТЬЮ, вся соль в сюжете. Он бесподобен. Моя голова была целиком и полностью в Колумбии. Проходя первый раз я даже не обратил внимания на графику, а она тут просто великолепная. Irrational Games выжали все соки из Unreal Engine 3. У меня вообще нет никаких претензий к игре. 10/10. Рекомендую всем пройти Bioshock Infinite хоть раз!
Сложное философское полотно от Левина с самой очаровательной напарницей в истории видеоигр.
Excelente game

This game has hit me in the feels harder than anything ever. I wasn't even close to crying when my grandfather died, but when this game ended? I fucking started balling like a baby. It's extremley fun, and isn't something you can finish in one try unless you're MLG. Took me, what, 5 days to finish? The plot is fucking crazy, in a good way. It starts out all generic and boring, save a girl from a floating city. Generic, amirite? Anyway, then the plot takes a turn to Methland and now we got shit from Quantum Physics, Time Travel, Alternate Realities, String Theory, and a bunch of more things I can't pronounce. By the end of this adventure you could write an essay from all the scientific shit is squeezed into the plot. Oh, speaking of plot, this game has NO PLOT HOLES. At all! Seriously! You might be thinking, "Well, then how does the city float?" Spoilers mutherfucker but I'm gonna tell you anyway. It's because of Quantum Physics. That's all I'm gonna say. "Well then how do they time travel?" The don't, they travel into another universe where time is backed up by an hour. "Well how do they travel to alterante universes?" Spoilers mutherfucker.

This is the end of my review, but get this game. It's fucking amazing.
I r8 8/8 m8.

정말 멋진게임이다. 

디스토피아적 세계관과 철학적인 스토리는 플레이 내내 지겹지 않게했다.
전작보다 FPS요소가 더 많아지기는 했지만 바이오쇼크 특유의 전투는 살아있었고
전작들의 음침한 분위기와는 달리 적어도 배경만은 아름다워서 더욱 좋았다.
개인적으로 명작으로 칭송받는 전작들보다도 더 마음에 들었다.

그리고 엘리자베스가 실제 존재하는 사람마냥 생동감이 있어서 마치 옆에 있는 느낌이였다.

Блять, да это охуенно.
Очень красивая игра, кучу скриншотов наделал себе. Динамично, красочно, лихой сюжет. Концовка заставляет задуматься.
Единственный минус - игра становится сложно только в режиме "1999 год".  
Спасибо Irrational'ам за этот шедевр. Requiescat in pace IG.
Super Jeux qui nous plonge dans un univers passionnant , une fois commencer on veut plus que sa finisse.
Игра очень понравилась не пожалел что купил. Продуманый сюжет, хороший экшен.

En un principio un cambio tan drastico de escenario respecto al primer juego me echaba para atrás. Pero una vez empiezas a jugarlo, ves que mantiene la esencia original de Bioshock. La historia igual que el original tiene unos giros que atrapan y te darán mas ganas de seguir jugando

Que decir de este juego y esta saga.... para mi la mejor saga de los ultimos años, aun saliendo de las profundidaes para conquistar el cielo, el guion, los personajes, la ambientacion y la musica son absolutamente increibles...

Великолепная игра. Жаль не начал играть сразу после выхода. Признаться, не знаком не с первой не со второй частью биошока, но, как мне заверяли, третья не связана с ними. И вот, наконец, я решил-таки приобрести эту игру и НИЧУТЬ не пожалел. В игре преобладают яркие насыщенные краски, кому то это не понравится, кто то любит только мрак, но лично мне понравилось, освещение на высоте. Атмосфра чувствуется с первых минут. Экшн просто зашкаливает, так что скучать вам не придется. 
Классика жанра. 
10 из 10.
nice game

Bioshock Infinite is a masterpiece.  It's the complete package.  Characters you can care about.  A phenomenal storyline.  Beautiful art design.  Great graphics.  And, it's really, really fun.  Pick it up.  It was a steal at sixty bucks, so any price you can get it for now is worth every penny tenfold.

나는 무엇보다 이야기 전달력에서 높은 평점을 주고 싶다.
이해하는데 다소 어려울 수 있는 세계관+이야기를 비교적 쉽게 이해할 수 있도록 구성해놓았다.
엔딩을 보고나면 여태까지 겪어온 이야기들이 머릿속에서 확 정리되기 시작한다.
거기서 오는 소름이 굉장하다. 
문을 따거나 길을 찾는데 들이는 시간이 없어서 정말 좋았다.

There are gameplay over story and story over gameplay kind of games. Which is this one? Defenetly story over gameplay. But -- you may ask, is there are like poor or non existant gameplay? No me mates, let's dig into game entirely and split pros from cons.

Graphics: Let's get it out of the way ASAP. Pretty, colorfull, astonishing at a times. Overall it is one of the most betufull games I ever saw in me life.

Animations: Porn to yer eyes! I can't describe it, it's awesome. Smooth and complicated motions of charecters and NPCs, flawless execution of moves, and skyhooks mechanics that feels just how it should work. Just play the game and experience it, you wont be disapointed.

Sound and music: I hardly remember any music in the game... So the OST is not the best, even though in musem from CitC DLC you can actually discover that there is music, pretty good, but not that it will stuck with you not even for a while. Sound design on the other hand is great! Sound operators must been working overtime to create such a earfest. Voice actors done amazing job (And you will be banished to HELL if you played this game on any languige except for ORIGINAL) the charecters sound very lively, and prays be Courtnee Draper that lass made Eli a real life person, I can't imagene any other voice of Eli than her's.

Gameplay: Well that what you've been waiting eh? I already menthioned that this game is story first... But it actually has gameplay! Like total: If ye played an other Xshock you know the drill. Vigors (Plasmids, Psypowers) and Gunplay (but with a twist, now you can carry only two guns). The game was simplified in compareson to previous shocks. Hacking is now power not a skill-based mechanic or mini-game or QTE, no variety of ammo to load in ye gun, no puzzles or cunny corners, and no way to die (you can't turn off resurection like in Bioshock 1 and 2). Does this makes Infinite lesser Bioshock? Yes and no. There are still a hell lot of gameplay! Skyhook that will allow you to "fight and flight", ters that can change the battle condition providing additional advantage to you and disadvantage to foes, and because you restricted to 2 guns and can't carry a lot of ammo you forced to use Vigors in combo and change tactics from battle to battle (think back to SystemShock or Bioshock where you could fight with you favor tactic for entire game). there are a rich variety of enemies from simple cops to fearsome Handymans and Crowmagicians. basicly, you wont be disapointed or bored, game is FUN. Only jsut go with hard or 1999 mode from the begining -- this will make game fun, when Normal is basicly easy and easy is basicly: "I'm 9 years old, playing with gamepad, and this is my first game actually, so cut me a slack".

Story: A meat and bones of a game... I can talk for hours about it. But spoilers and if ye never played this game before, you know the drill. But let's just say, that what developers done is so complicated and smart, that you wll have to play gme twice and keep a notepad (or have a really good memory) if you want to actually discover everything that happened. There a like 5 stories in one, easch with branching path and twists.... Well, i hope you're a smart lad or lassie, or you will probably loose a connection to a 3-4 stories to a middle and will fully give yeself to remaining 2-1, but even then you will be lost to a full picture. So yeah, game provides smartness of 90-s early 2000 games like Deus Ex or Eden. I could've talked some more, but will spare you and will shut up. Go play a bloody game (for the 2-nd or 3-rd time if needed) and just discover everything for yeself.

DLC Clash in the Clouds: A set of challenges. Your standart Arena with dares, if you like those -- you will have some more fun time with Infinite, if not... Well there is a musem where you can spend money that you earned from arenas to unlock; art, music, charecter models and videos it worth it yes.

DLC 2: Columbias Finest simply adds some gear to a begining of a game, that will greatly help! Not only at the begining ut throughout the game too. If there will be discount you can buy it. On the other hand, this DLC makes already easy game a walk in a park. So suit yeself. Youc an still buy it but restrain from using.

DLC 3: Burial at the sea Ep 1. More of our favorite Eli and Booker. Eli now a grown up lass, and she hires Booker from Rapture to help her with a search. There is a twists and turns. You will see Rapture before it was destroyed and HOLLY MTF this DLC is hard! Ammunition low, Eli is less helpfull that in original game, money cees to exict, and it doesn't help that now you can carry all guns in ye inventory. Is it wort it? Totaly! Not only because it's not bad by itself, but also because it connected to ep 2.

Epsiode 2: You play as Eli! Yay... Eli is dead! What? No, she just lost her powers, right? Sort off. Ok now we are getting close to spoilers. But yeah, you play as Eli, she lost her god powers, and now has to rely on stealth. That's right, Episode 2 is a stealth game in Bioshock universe. Is it good? Pretty good, like Dishonored actually. What about the story -- grand finalle! You HAVE to paly it if you 're a fan of BioShock and Infinite; it ties up all loose ends, and starts the sequence of Bioshock thus the wheels of story set in motion and all 3 games combining in one. 

Overall? Play the bloody Bioshock Infinite! The game already cult classic and will remain it for a milenius to come.

Great game with a complex but compelling story.

This game is all about story, if your looking for half-life quality gameplay look else where. The gameplay is bearable but does leave much to be desired. The story is amazing, featuring realistic and practical characteristics of quantum mechanics and character driven twist that make you feel for them, you will want to come back and play it again. The story by the end made me feel closure and it did well to explain the craziness. The a.i of the enemies is pretty great, with only afew flukes. But the pride and joy of the game is your a.i partner elizabeth who dynamically follows you with appropriate animation for her surroundings, it makes for the some of the best companinship in any game. It's half life 2 ep 1 with alyx good. She reacts vividly to everything going on and will help you given your predicament.

Overall it's a must play for the story the gameplay is nothing to flusture over. Casually playing through will land you 15 hours of gameplay, it is VERY linear and not as dynamic as I wish it was. The game is not as open ended as the 2011 gameplay promised and all the mechanics overall are used in a linear non strategic manner. The length is disapointing to say the least but take it as a movie or better yet a experience and less of a game.
I thought I was a really good game with a great storyline and some interesting game mechanics. I would definately recommend this game.
Absolute garbage. Holy hell how did they go from system shock to bioshock 1 and to this? No wonder the creator alt f4d the company out of existance.

Uno de los mejores juegos a los que he jugado. En cuanto a calidad grafica se refiere no es espectacular pero la jugabilidad y el argumento son muy buenos. Un juego muy recomendable junto con sus 2 dlc de Burial at sea.

Hopefully I won't get too much hate for saying my opinion about the game.

First I just want to say that Bioshock has one of the biggest impacts on my gaming career.  

I didn't like bioshock infinite, a good story does not make a good game. When you play a game like bioshock you go "Oh boy" I got this new ability that gives me an advantage over my opponent.  In Infinite, I rarely had the need to use any of the useless vigors you find throughout the game, all that was needed to succeed in this game was using the very boring guns that were available. Oh boy a machine gun, oh cool a sniper. That hasn't been done a million times.  There's a tacked on run n gun system and you take cover. Sound similar? I wanted more of the original game, I wanted to combine the experice from the other games to make my experience unique, and what do I get? A dumbed down shooter that feels boring.  You are limited to TWO weapons.....How's that fun? It's terrible, It leaves no room for creativity, you just mow down stuff with boring weapons and then move on to the next area. Rapture felt alive, this one was just really frusterating. I felt rushed, Good story =/= a good game. The story could have been told in a book, and it would have been better than this.  It just feels bland and something I have done a million times.  There was no real exploration, there was no real point. In Bioshock 1 you can find interesting side stories, that you had to find and use your limited resources to find. There was very little reward for exploring in Infinite.  The fact that there's a shield recovery system in this game, just makes it that much worse. What happened to shock shield, where whenever you took damage you would electrocute the attackers...There's no uniqueness in this game.  Just a boring upgrade system and boring weapon upgrades. 

If you want a casual, stupidly cinematic call of duty experince with bioshock get this.  This doesn't live up to the series, and you can argue against me if you want but I just wanted to get another opinion out on this game.
Игра класс!

Before you just dislike this review just hear me out, the good about this game is it does a very good job at being atmospheric and the story is pretty good, but this games combat is so repetitive it feels like a chore, i dont even know how i finished it. the combat makes this game very very very boring for me theres no enemy variation, only a couple of abilities and not alot of guns plus the mechanics are so simply it makes this game hard to play through. i know all you fanboys will disagree because of the story or say the potions are good enough to hold the combat. but that is simply not true, i give this game a 5/10.
Really fun game, fast and action packed. Powers + Guns = Awesome.

I loved Bioshock and played through it multiple times so when I learned that Irrational was gonna make Bioshock Infinite I watched the trailers over and over again til my eyes bled! I was so excited about this game that I kinda felt worried that I might be expecting too much from it since I loved Bioshock so much. I was kinda afraid of being disappointed with playing a clone of Bioshock. Boy was I sure surprised when I got the game and played it! There were many elements of the game that made it a Bioshock game (successor) but still managed to have an identity of its own. Sure there were still Plasmids/Vigors, and you still had to save a girl/girls (little sisters and Elizabeth) but Infinite is an entirely differnt experience altogether with the new characters, the surprisingly populated streets of Columbia, the enhanced combat experience and most of all the brilliant story.
You have to finish the game in order to fully be amazed at Bioshock Infinite's story. If you still haven't played this game you better start now before you get too old or too preoccupied to appreciate vidoe games! You will never regret spending your time in Columbia! 
Played Infinite first on the 360 and now I just bought it from the Steam Summer Sale for my PC. That's how much I love this game!
This game is no short of a master peice

I recommend having played through Bioshock 1 & 2 before this game, but this story can stand on its own for a person new to the Bioshock world.  This is a great FPS throwing you into a fictional, flying American-ish civilization and pitting you against almost everyone.

The new story and setting give an excellent break from Rapture but keeping the same gameplay feel from the old games.  However, the new content really helps Bioshock Infinite shine even more, with stuff like the Skyhook system and the Burial at Sea DLC.

Mind-blowing story, great graphics and characters/voice actors.  There is a lot of beautiful stuff to see while you're struggling through Columbian forces.

If you've played Bioshock 1 and 2 before Bioshock Infinite, I 100% recommend the Burial at Sea DLC after you finish Bioshock Inifinite.  They take you back to Rapture, and I don't want to reveal any more from there...
Beautiful.
Amazing gameplay.  Very linear, but rich story.

Smart, cerebral shooter:
Bioshock Infinite has a gripping story centralized around it's principle characters. The Protagonist, Booker, must make his way through a re-imagined city based around turn-of the century America.
The narrative is rewarding, though potentially difficult to grasp.
This is not as horror-based as the previous Bioshock installments, though there are some dark portions and one jump scare.

The DLC is worthwhile, though may be skipped.
good game

I heard so many good things about this game, and the whole Bioshock series, before I ever had the opportunity to play any of them. Now I have played all of them and I can say that I am completely unimpressed with Bioshock Infinite. I may be the only one to ever say this, but this game is awful.

Let's start with the idea of free will. The point of a role-playing game is to take on a persona and act as if you are living this alternate reality. Typical elements of RPG style games are character creation, dialogue choices, story event choices, and typically the ability to alter the way the game plays out, giving multiple endings, and allowing replay value. Bioshock Infinte has none of this. This game is a first-person shooter all the way, resembling Doom more than Fallout 3. Bioshock 2 certainly had some free will in the player's decision to kill or not kill many individuals, it pretended to be more of a RPG/FPS. But Bioshock Infinite lacks any such finesse.

How about the story? Well, the payoff at the end is a sad joke. It doesn't even make sense, and pretty much negates the whole conflict of the game. Every single interesting point where the game could take off is cut off and pushed aside, instead replaced with almost new beginning to the story, and skipping about everything that was suposed to be intriguing. The entire game you a dragged and pushed along a pre-ordained line of events, with no say in how you want things to actually turn out other than who you shoot first. It may as well have been a movie, but that would have been as fun as when they made Doom into a movie.

Finally, why is it even called Bioshock? It has nothing to do with the previous 2 games, and can make no connecting lines to System Shock (as Bioshock was rumored to be a early step in that story, and tribute to that franchise). Unlike previous Bishock games, there's barely any frame of reference of when and where this story is taking place. Somewhere between 1886 and 1932, maybe? Hovering 300 or 500 ft in the air above North America or the Atlantic Ocean? No other nation on Earth is trying to attack this flying city, or is there nothing left of the world below? It's all vague when it really needs to be established since Paris and New York are mentioned in the game.

So I would say, for $5 it's worth it. Don't expect much and you might really enjoy it. But game of the year? I guess there's no one trying to make great games, so maybe it was. I find that hard to believe.

Welcome to a world of extracting goodies from trashcans, suitcases, and all manner of containers.  Fly around with Kareem Abdul Jabar's signature skyhook in a world full of turn of the century sky racists.  Shoot them, stab them, burn them.  The world is your oyster so long as you save the girl.  Good times.

BioShock Infinite é um jogo de tiro em primeira pessoa, desenvolvido pela Irrational Games e publicado pela 2K Games para PC, Xbox 360 e PlayStation 3 em 26 de março de 2013. Infinite é o terceiro game da série BioShock, e conquanto não seja imediatamente parte da história dos jogos anteriores ele apresenta conceitos de jogabilidade semelhantes e também um tema com semelhanças aos games anteriores.

BioShock Infinite se passa em 1912 durante o crescimento do excepcionalismo americano,o protagonista, o ex-Pinkerton, agente Booker DeWitt, enviado para a cidade flutuante localizado em Columbia com a missão de encontrar uma jovem mulher, Elizabeth, que foi mantida em cativeiro na maior parte de sua vida. Columbia é uma cidade fictícia estilo Steampunk suspensa no ar por meio de uma tecnologia chamada de "levitação quântica", dirigíveis gigantes e balões. Columbia é uma cidade utópica cheia de vida, cor e alegria…ou pelo menos assim parece. Tudo tem o seu porém, e enquanto se passa pelos belos cenários, há vários NPCs contentes ou interessantes ao longo da nossa jornada, também descobrimos ao longo do caminho um lado sombrio desta cidade que recria a “era excepcional” dos Estados Unidos da América. Temas maduros como a descriminação racial, sexismo e religião estão expostos no jogo de uma maneira bastante frontal e convincentes, que tanto podem chocar como impressionar. 
Durante os acontecimentos, as tensões raciais aumentaram até o ponto onde Columbia está à beira de uma guerra civil, travada entre os governantes "Fundadores" e o insurgente "Vox Populi", duas facções com ideologias opostas. Os Fundadores são a facção política que prevalece na cidade, eles são racistas ultranacionalistas que mantiveram o poder e controle sobre Columbia, e procuram manter Columbia puramente para cidadãos brancos americanos, negando a estrangeiros sues diverso privilégios. O Vox Populi (latim para "voz do povo") são um grupo de resistência oposta aos ultra-nacionalistas. Formou-se a partir de vários grupos com ideologias semelhantes, eles lutam para tomar o controle e restaurar os direitos de cidadania colombiana para as pessoas de todas as raças e religiões. No entanto, anos de lutas amargas têm impulsionado o Vox Populi em direção a oposição com um tremendo ódio cego, resultando em métodos mais violentos e brutais.
Além da disputa interna, Columbia é devastada por "Tears" (ou fendas) no tecido do espaço-tempo. Sendo o resultado de experimentos científicos do passado, essas fendas se revelam passagens para universos alternativos, e também permitem a interação com eles. Enquanto a maioria dos cidadãos colombianos consideram estas fendas como mera curiosidade, algumas pessoas têm explorado a visão oferecida por eles para criar radicalmente novas armas e tecnologias, enquanto outros copiaram músicas futuristas, baseando-se em canções ouvidas a partir das fendas, trazendo elementos anacrônicos para o ano de 1912.
In a tldr format, this game has a wonderful story but lacks good combat dynamics to support it, making the game very repetitve  . Watch total biscuit's review on this game.

"Even in a utopia, someone needs to clean up the mess. And that's where I come in. The girl promised me a way out, and I was desperate enough to believe her.

One of the best games i've played in a while. If you're new to Bioshock, 3 things: get the originals, play them, and then play this one. If you're not new and you have the originals, [u]would you kindly[/u] play this one. Highly recommended.

If you have a life BY NO MEANS BY THIS GAME! I used to be like you. I had friends, I had a social life, I went outside. Then i discovered the Bioshock series. Everything changed! I HAVE'NT BEEN OUTSIDE IN MONTHS!!! I have'nt seen another person in days and I have no idea what is going on in the world. This game will control you and make you obesse with the characters and the world. I feel in love with a ficticious character! Don't be like me just enjoy the game but dont get sucked in and begin to dream about living in Columbia. I HAD HOUSE PLANTS FOR GOD'S SAKE!!

=====BIOSHOCK INFINITE + DLC =====
O jogo de tiro em primeira pessoa se passa em 1912, tirando os jogadores da submersa Rapture e os colocando em Columbia, uma cidade  imensa nos céus. Na trama, Booker DeWitt, ex-agente da agência Pinkerton de investigação e segurança particular, é enviado para resgatar a jovem Elizabeth, presa em Columbia desde criança. Os dois, depois de estabelecer uma relação que amplia suas habilidades, precisam escapar da cidade condenada, que está literalmente despencando das nuvens.

+ Pontos positivos

+ Enredo fantástico
+ Gráficos deslumbrantes
+ Personagens muito carismáticos
+ Jogabilidade extremamente divertida
+ Trilha sonora expetacular
+ Grandes reviravoltas

Burial at Sea EPISODE 1+EPISODE 2
No DLC somos uma versão alternativa do investigador Booker DeWitt, de Infinite, vivendo na Rapture de 1958 de BioShock. O jogo abre com a visita de uma Elizabeth mais madura e determinada ao escritório de Booker, persuadindo-o a descobrir o paradeiro de uma das muitas garotas que, por alguma razão, estão desaparecendo em Rapture.

+ Pontos positivos

+ Uma Rapture de tirar o fôlego
+ Gráficos ainda mais bonitos
+ Ligação definitiva entre Columbia e Rapture
+ Fechamento da saga BioShock com chave de ouro
+ Trilha sonora continua espetacular

Conclusão:
BioShock Infinite mais a DLC Burial at Sea vieram para fechar com chave de ouro. Pra mim a saga BioShock é a melhor de todos os tempos. BioShock Infinite juntamente com DLC Burial at Sea é o melhor jogo que já joguei nesta geração. Sobre as DLC, no episódio 1 foi criticado que teve várias pontas soltas que não foram explicadas, parece que as pessoas esquecerem que iria ter o episódio 2 que ia explicar tudo detalhadamente.
Você perceberam que eu não citei pontos negativos né ? Pois é, sinceramente eu não vi defeito algum nesse BioShock Infinite, foi uma experiência fantástica. Recomendo muito comprarem BioShock Infinite e fazer um esforço para comprar a season pass.


Notas :
História: 10/10
Jogabilidade: 10/10
Som: 10/10
Trilha Sonora: 10/10
Optimização: 10/10
Gráficos: 10/10

Final: 10/10 O MELHOR DA GERAÇÂO ! ( na minha opinião ) :)
Historia muy buena y dificil de comprender... se necesita jugar varias veces y escuchar atentamente todo lo que se dice.

25 марта 2013 года, Именно тогда я взял управление над героем Букер Девитт, которые повели его на поиски девушки Элизабет, оказалась дочерью главного Героя. Девятнадцатилетняя девушка, обладающая сверхъестественными способностями. Заключена в башню Агнец в Колумбии. Охраняется крылатой машиной по прозвищу Соловей. Bioshock Infinite концовка оставила больше вопросов не лежи ответов! Ken Levine пообещал раскрыть часть всех секретов в первом DLC Burial at Sea. В первом DLC Элизабет представила из себя нечто вроде Лютесов, в конце BioShock Infinite произошло некое собрание Элизабет со всех миров. Благодаря такому состоянию она способна видеть бесконечное разнообразие со всех миром, Ken Levine предоставил нам элигантную фразу в виде способность видеть двери и то что за ними. За ними она видит то что Комсток он же Букер Девитт, которому удалось сбежать от нее и избежать наказаниев другом мире и попадает в rapture. Но продолжу историю DLC Burial at Sea где Элизабет нанимает Букера,что бы найти пропавшую девочку Салли.. Этим же заманить его на смерть, где Букер умрет от руки большого Папочки. И теперь мне стало ясно что все Комстоки погибли во всех мирам. Во втором DLC Burial at Sea где все Элизабет слипаются в одну где она становится обычной девушкой. Это дорога смерти Элизабет "Туз в рукаве", тут отвлеку ваше внимание и вспомню Bioshock тот самый в котором все начиналось... имя главного героя Джек, он же сын Эндрю Райана главный враг Атласа он же "Фрэнк Фонтейн"! Фонтейн был убит Джеком, тем самым спас 5 девочек вырастив их как дочерей вот все что нужно знать о первой части Bioshock... Туз в рукаве то что хотел узнать Атлас во втором DLC Burial at Sea. Скажу о Элизабет со сверхъестественными способностями она знала о Джеке, знала что он спасет Салли и других девочек, знала что Атлас убьет её. Не смотря на все она шла до конца, она хотела прервать круг жестокости.. в которой она сыграла не малую роль.... Погибла ли Элизабет на всегда, скорее всего ДА! Буду только думать о том что в другом Мире Дочь Букера "Анна" не станет Элизабет, и он не продаст ее в карты, и Они будут отличной семьей!! Спасибо Irrational Games спасибо Ken Levine,какой бы не была концовка весь путь был к ней очень интересен,и время потраченое на BioShock стоило того! Спасибо...

Оценка, 10/10

BioShock Infinite ist meiner Meinung nach eines der wenigen richtig guten Games. Die Story ist wirklich fesselnd und man will die ganze Zeit wissen wie es weiter geht. Das Ende ist zum Teil überraschend und etwas traurig. Leider ist das Ganze dann auch entsprechend schnell durchgespielt (hab ca. 11 Stunden gebraucht und das mit sehr viel rumtrödeln und Gegend erkunden). Aber von mir gibt es eine eindeutige Kaufempfehlung!

I really liked this game even though I'm a bit adverse to full on violence (nb. there is definitely full on violence in this game). I think that as a big point and click fan this had a good balance of story and doing stuff. The game environment is beautiful and I really enjoyed the theming throughout. I think one of the best things was that if you die, you come back and it's a little easier.
